description.value:
Fear

Aura 3

Enemies within the aura take a -2 penalty to attack rolls.
At the start of its turn, the god-golem makes a saving throw against one effect of its choice that a save can end.

The god-golem has six soul gems, each of which can hold the soul of one of its victims. At the start of an encounter, two of the soul gems contain souls. Crushing a gem after the god-golem is defeated releases the soul to the Shadowfell.

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ necrotic

Standard

Attack: Melee 3 (one creature)

+28 vs. AC

Hit: 4d12 + 14 necrotic damage.

At-Will ✦ necrotic

Standard

Effect: The god-golem makes two death slam attacks. If both attacks hit the same target, the god-golem uses drain soul against the target as a free action.

Recharge 5-6

Standard

Attack: Ranged 5 (one creature)

+26 vs. Fortitude

Hit: The target is dazed and restrained (save ends both).

First Failed Saving Throw: The target is instead stunned and restrained (save ends both).

Second Failed Saving Throw: The target dies, and its soul is trapped in one of the god-golem's soul gems until the soul is consumed or the god-golem is destroyed (see "Fate of Drained Souls").

Special: This power does not provoke opportunity attacks.

Recharge 5-6 ✦ lightning, necrotic, thunder

Standard

Requirement: The god-golem must have a trapped soul available in one of its soul gems.

Attack: Close blast 3 (creatures in the blast)

+26 vs. Reflex

Hit: 6d10 + 9 lightning, necrotic, and thunder damage, and the target is stunned until the end of the god-golem's next turn.

Effect: The god-golem expends a trapped soul from one of its soul gems.

Recharge 6 ✦ healing

Minor

Effect: The god-golem expends a trapped soul from one of its soul gems and regains 200 hit points.

Encounter

Triggered

Trigger: The god-golem is first bloodied.

Attack (Free Action): Close blast 5 (creatures in the blast)

+26 vs. Will

Hit: 3d12 + 10 damage, and the target is slowed and weakened (save ends both).

At-Will ✦ fear, necrotic

Triggered

Trigger: A creature fails a saving throw against the god-golem's drain soul.

Attack (Immediate Reaction): Close burst 5 (creatures in the burst)

+26 vs. Will

Hit: 6d8 + 6 necrotic damage, and the target is immobilized and takes a -2 penalty to saving throws (save ends both).

Resist 15 necrotic, 15 psychic Immune disease, poison, sleep 		Init +15 | AP 2 | Save +5
AC 37Fort 35Ref 34Will 32
Speed 6

Cha 18 (+15)
Languages Common
Alignment Evil

Passive Perception 27 | Insight 32

At the start of an encounter, two of the soul gems contain souls. Crushing a gem after the god-golem is defeated releases the soul to the Shadowfell.</p>]] Soul Gems

The god-golem has six soul gems, each of which can hold the soul of one of its victims. At the start of an encounter, two of the soul gems contain souls. Crushing a gem after the god-golem is defeated releases the soul to the Shadowfell.
